Lord Elder's commands were carried out by the station=
 and the guns 
erupted into the air with a deadly symphony of wreckage! Fir=
epower 
ripped into the invaders as first the shuttle's batteries and then =

the Ark violently pulled sweeps from the skies! 

However much like the la=
st battle the sweeps dispersed, making them 
much harder to hit. Using thei=
r agility and speed they turned in the 
air, spinning as the weapons contin=
ued to pepper the skies with 
bullets and energy!

Legacy for his part pull=
ed back, using the Ark as an additional 
defence as he laid into the oncomi=
ng sweeps. Much like Lord Elder's 
attack, it was effective but the sweep d=
isperesed, leaving him to 
pick one or two out of the air at a time rather =
then destroying many 
at a time. 

As Jhiaxus and Scorponok, Grimlock and H=
ydras and Rodimus all 
approached from their different vectors, they could =
all see the grim 
vista of the sweeps, and the number of them was staggerin=
g. At the 
center of all this Cyclonus floated a cold calm amidst the storm=
 of 
sweeps that floated around him. 

To those who had been at the battle =
above Atlantis the sight brought 
a darker reality: Although there were not=
 as many sweep here as there 
were at Atlantis, with Cyclonus were several =
other minions: Darkfate 
and Nightstrike as well as three others which were=
 unknown - A 
warning that this battle may prove to be far more dangerous t=
hen the 
one before.
 
As Grimlock landed and attacked his breath weapon at=
tack proved to be 
effective, striking down several sweeps and singed sever=
al others as 
they maneuvered out of his way. 
 
As Hydras approached from =
the rear his guns opening up on the rear 
flank of the sweeps, they dispers=
ed into the skies as several of them 
were brought down and many more came =
in to take their places. 

As the sweeps coiled around, absorbing the attac=
ks from the would-be 
defenders, in unison they began to open fire on Ark a=
nd Legacy as 
well as Grimlock and the defending shuttle!

At same time min=
ions were receiving orders from Scourge who was 
himself floating into posi=
tion and was more then ready to prove 
himself, "Tumult, Nightstrike and Da=
rkfate You are with me! We go to 
destroy the ark, and TAKE the Matrix!"

T=
he answer from Tumult was quick, "Yes Sir!" as he powered up his 
engines a=
nd maneuvered himself into position near the top of the host.

Strangely th=
e response for the approaching Decepticons and Predicons 
was a bit differe=
nt - Although the Sweeps avoided combat, no combat

 Hydras recieved a call: 

"Hydras" Cyclonus' calm voice crackled over the =
communication lines

n, I can feel

proached.
